articles.title: Spain parliament approves menstrual leave, teen abortion and transgender protections - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: Spain's parliament has approved laws expanding abortion and trans rights for teenagers, while making Spain the first country in Europe entitling workers to paid menstrual leave.
articles.content: MADRID (AP) The Spanish parliament on Thursday approved legislation expanding abortion and transgender rights for teenagers, while making Spain the first country in Europe that will entitle workers t… [+2768 chars]
